ReferenceDocuments.name: Were the protocol-defined tes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were the protocol-defined testing conditions met?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record whether protocol defined testing conditions were met.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUPPLB.QVAL
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. This information could be submitted in a SUPPLB dataset as the value of SUPPLB.QVAL where SUPPLB.QNAM ="LBCOND" and SUPPLB.LABEL="Test Condition Met". Refer to the current SDTM and SDTMIG for instructions on placement of non-standard variables in SDTM domains.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: This information is collected when the laboratory test results may be affected by whether conditions for testing were properly met. The specific testing conditions required should be pre-printed on the CRF. This may not be relevant for all tests.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG-Text-1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient meet laboratory parameters as defined in the eligibility section in order to be eligible to proceed to the next cycle?
